messages.title: Demand Better For Britain
messages.content: Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
issues.economy: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.

community.content: Demand Better For Britain; local and European elections success.

contactInformation.address: Freepost Erewash Liberal Democrats, Unit 1, Great Northern Court, Great Northern Road, Derby, DE1 1LR

endorsements.endorsement: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels.

quotes.text: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

examples: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels.
The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.
The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels.
The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
